Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Southbound  Reroute near Archer/Canal
ShortDescription: Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Orange Line, Halsted, 26th and Wallace, due to street blockage near Archer/Canal.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Orange Line, Halsted, 26th and Wallace, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Archer/Canal.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/87th
ShortDescription: Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Dan Ran, exit 87th and Lafayette, due to police activity near Lafayette/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 79th, Dan Ran, exit 87th and Lafayette, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near Lafayette/87th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
